thread.title: The Times and Sunday Times Travel Awards: apology
thread.title_full: The Times and Sunday Times Travel Awards: apology | The Sunday Times

author: The Sunday Times
title: The Times and Sunday Times Travel Awards: apology
text: D ue to a technical error, readers were unable to vote in our Travel Awards on Sunday, August 9th. We apologise for the frustration this caused. To put things right, we have extended the voting period to 11.59pm on Monday, August 17. All votes cast by then will count towards the final result, and voters will be entered into the prize draw to win one of 20 luxury holidays. You can cast your votes now at thesundaytimes.co.uk/thetravelawards201
